metadata.title: CVE-2022-48340 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/cluster/dht/src/dht-common.cdht_setxattr_mds_cbk use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48340` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-cli - 11.1-1
glusterfs-client - 11.1-1
glusterfs-common - 11.1-1
glusterfs-server - 11.1-1
libgfapi0 - 11.1-1
libgfchangelog0 - 11.1-1
libgfrpc0 - 11.1-1
libgfxdr0 - 11.1-1
libglusterfs0 - 11.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '11.1-1').
